name: The Dead Flowers Case (Canceled)
blurb: An eccentric and fascinating game for PC, Mac & Tablets in a steampunk universe by the producers of Syberia & Amerzone and S. Halleux

rewards.reward:
The Dead Flowers Friend

=============================

Thank you! You'll receive Kickstarter backer updates (digital). Your support helps us a lot.

The Mouse Player (PC or Mac digital)\r\n============================= Digital download of The Dead Flowers Case (Pc or Mac) + exclusive wallpaper + access to the exclusive news about the game on the dedicated forum + your name in the backers section of the credits.
The Tactile Player (IOS or Andro\u00efd)\r\n============================= Digital mobile download of The Dead Flowers Case (iOS or Android) + 5 exclusive wallpapers\r\n(+ All previous rewards)

Listen to the music !\r\n============================= Original Soundtrack by Philippe Saisse (digital) + Artbook in digital format (pdf) + early access to the Beta version with survey on the gameplay + your name in the Beta Testers section\r\n(+ All previous rewards)

Gimme the game
============================= Exclusive The Dead Flowers Case boxed edition (PC / Mac) + exclusive limited T-Shirt
Free shipping
(+ All previous rewards)

Exclusive Art Book
============================= Exclusive limited edition of The Dead Flowers Case Artbook + CD of the soundtrack + Official walkthrough (pdf)  
Free shipping
(+ All previous rewards)

Luxury Edition & signed print !
============================= Luxury boxed edition of The Dead Flowers Case (PC / Mac) + Artbook signed by the team + Exclusive and signed by Stéphane Halleux printed Artwork (A2 format)
Free shipping
(+ All previous rewards)

Rare collector statue !
============================= Limited and numbered statue, with certificate of authenticity signed by Stephane Halleux : the culprit, sealed into a bag (beware : opening the bag means knowing the culprit) + vote on a game design specific point + your name in the Bronze section of the credits
This statue will NEVER be available outside Kickstarter.
Free shipping
(+ All previous rewards)

Statue of the investigator\r\n=============================\r\nLimited and numbered 3D statue, with certificate of authenticity signed by Stephane Halleux : the investigator + Limited \u00ab Luxury \u00bb boxed edition of The Dead Flowers Case, signed by Stephane Halleux and the Team + another exclusive, limited and signed printed Artwork (A1 format) + vote on a second game design specific point + your name in the Silver section of the credits. Free shipping (+ all previous rewards)

Third statue : Chief of police\r\n============================= Limited and numbered statue (100 ex.), with certificate of authenticity signed by Stephane Halleux : the Chief of Police + Access to the Alpha version of the game with survey on the gameplay + your name in the Gold section of the credits. Free shipping\r\n(+ All previous rewards)

YOUR own Big Machine...\r\n============================= Limited and numbered statue (only 25 ex.), with certificate of authenticity signed by Stephane Halleux : the Big Machine + Your name in the Game : your name (real or pseudonym) will appear in-game, in a document that is part of the gameplay + A personnalized dedicated message signed by Stephane Halleux and the Team on the Luxury Box + if you wish : Skype conference call with the Team at Alpha stage to discuss the design and gameplay. Free shipping\r\n(+ All previous rewards)

The ultra rare full set of statues\r\n============================= Ultra limited and numbered statue (only 10 ex !), with certificate of authenticity signed by Stephane Halleux : the Mecabrain lying at his desk + Your name (real or pseudonym) in the game dialogs + your name in the Platinium section (top of the list). The 5 statues altogether compose the full crime scene \u2013 there will only be 15 complete set of statues in the world (the 10 set for this pledge and the 5 also included in the $ 10 000 pledge) !!!  Free shipping.\r\n(+ All previous rewards)

4 days in Paris\r\n============================= One two-way ticket to Paris + 4 nights in a hotel near the studio + visit of the studio +  dinner with Stephane Halleux and the Team in a famous parisian restaurant (you'll be able to indicate us the month of your choice for the trip).  Free shipping\r\n(+ All previous rewards)
